mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tp_richtext (TXT_ID, TXT_TYPE, REFER_ID, CONTENT) VALUES (#{txtId}, #{txtType}, #{referId}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT TXT_ID, TXT_TYPE, REFER_ID, CONTENT FROM tp_richtext WHERE REFER_ID = #{referId} limit 1
mapper.delete: delete from tp_richtext WHERE REFER_ID = #{referId} and TXT_TYPE = #{txtType}
